summary: The customer is looking to upgrade their streaming services with Contoso Wireless. The agent informed the customer that Contoso Wireless offers a variety of streaming packages, from basic to more advanced ones with additional features. The customer is interested in a package that provides access to the most popular streaming platforms and the latest content. The agent informed them that the premium package offers HD and 4K resolution, exclusive content, live TV channels, and an on-demand library. The customer can sign up for the premium package on the Contoso Wireless website.
